title: American Horror Story 10: PROMO (HD)
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: evan peters might come back from the aliens
Evan Peters has said in a past interview that if he could choose the theme for a ahs season, it'd be something related to space

I’ve been chomping at the bit for this ever since Asylum. I mean, come on, they just can’t wind us up with all that Kit implant story and the abductions of several characters only to leave us hanging forever. I’m not saying that’s where Season 10 is going to lead us but if it does, it’ll certainly please the loyal fanbase, won’t it?
Oh man, Evan Peters HAS to be in this season! I'm gonna be disappointed if he's not but I'm still hype asf for the theme.
"Its not America so it will never happen" NASA is American. If the characters are American astronauts/government workers its still American Horror Story.
